Ipswich Mobile Library Route 16

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 16 Town/village Location Time
MIP/16A Little Blakenham High Beeches 0915 – 0930
MIP/16B Somersham Community Shop 0935 – 1025
MIP/16C Willisham North Acres 1035 – 1100
MIP/16D Barking Barking Fox 1105 – 1120
MIP/16E Battisford Church 1125 – 1140
MIP/16F Battisford Old School 1145 – 1200
MIP/16G Ringshall Village Hall 1310 – 1340
MIP/16G1 Wattisham Mace Shop 1345 – 1415
MIP/16H Great Bricett Wixfield Park 1420 – 1445
MIP/16I Nedging Tye Marshmoor Park, Wallow Lane 1455 – 1530
MIP/16J Offton Castle Meadow 1540 – 1555
MIP/16K Flowton Church 1605 – 1620

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2016: 7 January, 4 February, 3 March, 31 March, 28 April, 26 May, 23 June, 21 July, 18 August, 15 September, 13 October, 10 November, 8 December

2017: 5 January, 2 February
